content: hi what can u tell me about bluethistle?

BlueThistle AI offers AI-powered chatbot and automation solutions to enhance businesses' efficiency and customer service. They provide various packages like the Basic AI Package with a setup fee of £500, the Advanced AI Package with a setup fee of £750, and the 24/7 AI Support Package with a setup fee of £1,000【5†source】. For more details, you can visit their website at https://bluethistleai.co.uk/.
